item.description:
Try your hand at Frisbee golf!

 

The disc golf course at Borderland is a long walk through the woods, about 2.5 miles to walk all 18 holes.  Parking  is $2 per car.  No addition cost to play.  Carpools can try to be arranged through the message board below.

 

Apparently they are no longer allowed to sell the disc golf discs at the visitor center anymore, so you will need to buy them ahead of time or borrow from a friend.  Discs can not really be shared.  It would be like trying to share a golf ball while playing golf.

 

http://www.borderlanddiscgolf.com/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the visitor center
item.name: Disc Golf at Borderland State Park
